currentStep.description: The current step that the progress bar is on.
currentStep.name: currentStep

totalSteps.description: The total steps to use. For percentages you can set this to 100.
totalSteps.name: totalSteps

size.description: Set the size of the progress bar
size.name: size

variation.description: Set the variation of the progress bar
variation.name: variation

UNSAFE_className.description:
**Use at your own risk:** Custom class names for specific elements. This should only be used as a
**last resort**. Using this may result in unexpected side effects.
More information in the [Customizing components Guide](https://atlantis.getjobber.com/guides/customizing-components).
UNSAFE_className.name: UNSAFE_className

UNSAFE_style.description:

**last resort**. Using this may result in unexpected side effects.
More information in the [Customizing components Guide](https://atlantis.getjobber.com/guides/customizing-components).
UNSAFE_style.name: UNSAFE_style
